segments.text: What should we do this Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Rocky six is suppose to come out this Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but I don't know if it is going to be any good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The only reason I want to see it is because I have seen the previous five .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True . Ok . Let's see it this Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about we hook up for lunch at 12:00 , and then go see the movie afterwards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like a plan . Let's meet in front of Tower Records at 12:00 .
segments.speaker: S1
